DOC.brief_title: Open Label , Randomized Study Low Concentration Ioforminol Injections Use Abdominal CECT Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male females 18 50 year age . The subject maximum abdominal circumference 120 cm less . The subject know Grade 3 4 allergic reaction/hypersensitivity either iodine iodinatedbased contrast agent history multiple allergy ( i.e. , food , pet , medication , etc ) . The subject chronic renal insufficiency ( estimate glomerular filtration rate [ eGFR ] < 60 mg/dL ) measure screen visit . The subject pregnant breastfeeding . The subject suspicion diagnosis hyperthyroidism autonomously function thyroid nodule confirm T3 , T4 , and/or thyroidstimulating hormone . The subject severe liver hematologic disease ( sickle cell disease multiple myeloma ) , immunodeficiency . The subject take metformin ( e.g. , GlucophageÂ® ) therapy .
